::Spears::

She grabbed the spear from Striker. "YES!" she shook her head,"I mean 
NO!" She turned and threw the spear into the wall over her bed across 
the room.  She turned and looked at Striker again. "I'm Fine. Go 
Away!" She slammed the door again with a loud THWAM!  She turned and 
walked over to the spear.  she pulled it out of the wall and let it 
dropp to the bed.  She sat down on the bed next to the spear and 
stared at the floor.  She was pissed.  She once again had the 
oppertunity to kill a pred and was denied because of another hostage 
situation.  Anger flowed through her and she felt like there was no 
release for it.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker raises an eyebrow, looking Spears over, noting the angry 
look in her 
> eyes and the bruised hand. He holds the spear out to her for her to 
take.
> 
> "I found this stuck in the hallway. Something bothering you?"
